posts.post_content:
Greetings.

I have a few nice T206 HOF with rare backs which I am considering moving from my collection. I will discuss straight sales, though trading for other rare backs would be my preference.

If for any reason you feel you may have a match please write to me and I will be happy to chit chat.

Many thanks.

Derek

PS

I can include cash in a deal if necessary and I do have a few other nice cards which are not pictured, should things get really frisky ...
Wow, great cards Derek.  Good luck.
I think there are two on eBay right now (unfortunately neither one is mine.)

World Series Bump ...

YA GOTTA' BELIEVE !!!

Derek
I can hear that train rollin' on down the tracks ...

Hi Derek
Sorry I can't help, but here's the one I used to own. I hope you don't mind
my intrusion in your thread.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/baseball/whatusedtobe/large/Johnson-Hindu.jpg[/IMG]
Wow Mike, that is a fantastic card. I would love that one - and I imagine Derek would as well (good luck in your hunt).
No intrusion Mike. That card is sweet! :)
A friendly holiday bump to my fellow Monster enthusiasts.
bump, looking for trade partners with rare backs
